item.title: Heritage Church CPC
item.description:
Heritage Church CPC, 2017 CD Project

Thanks for sticking with us through our 2017 project to record and memorize four Psalms together!

For your enjoyment, all the music we recorded in March of 2017 at the Wightman Chapel / Scarritt-Bennett Center in Nashville has been released on CD. To purchase your copy, please click the ‘Buy Now’ button below.

In addition to the music, all the memorization materials we produced are included on the CD, and laid out in order for ease of use at home or in the car. We hope this disc will become a cherished bit of family culture for you and your children.

Psalm Memorization:

Psalm 15, KJV

Psalm 23, KJV

Psalm 103, KJV

Psalm 139, KJV

Thanks again to the Centerville String Quartet and Scott Young, and for the many others who played their part in bringing this production to fruition.

Enjoy!

Shipping options

Please share in the comments down below!
